name: Air Hockey Halloween
summary: Air Hockey Halloween is a great air hockey game with halloween theme, beautiful graphics, great effects, easy to learn, hard to master gameplay, and it's free! Play against the gruesome, horrifying monsters with the fearless monster hunter in the game's campaign, and try to beat each enemy the best way you can to unlock new content, or play against your friend on the same device! 24 different monsters to beat on 4 levels.
